author: Jana Vieyra
text: My dogs are so excited to see Rochelle and her team. They are very good with my pets and I can rest easy that they will be well taken care of.

author: Nigel and Margaret Lambert
text: Speedy, gentle and kind to our sensitive dogs. Highly recommend.

author: Anntesia de Villiers
text: Please support this doggi parlour in Kenridge.
